solution_line_template: Six sets of 1 dozen of doughnuts cost ${cost_one_dozen} x {num_sets_one_dozen} = $<<{num_sets_one_dozen}*{cost_one_dozen}={cost_six_sets_one_dozen}>>{cost_six_sets_one_dozen}.
Three sets of 2 dozens of doughnuts cost ${cost_two_dozens} x {num_sets_two_dozens} = ${cost_three_sets_two_dozens}.
